post.desc:
I don't think she'd reach them on her tiptoes though with that distance... ü§® her forehead, maybe.

Anyway, I still can't get rid of my initial height impression for Tenshi being about the same as Reimu.

We see her all menacing standing on her keystone, but she's, like, even shorter than Marisa. Wait a minute... is it possible that this is what she looked like when she became a celestial? Like, Chiko/Tenshi stopped growing physically too. That's why she looks like a middle school kid.

I think I can see the spectrum now ‚Äì Tenshi is just a little taller than Remilia and Flandre.
